roleset.name: be a renter
roleset.note: RENT-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus; nominal 'renting' based on BOLT-7. Comparison with 'lease'. Member of Vncls get-13.5.1. (from rent.01-v)
RENTAL-N NOTES: Based on ontonots nouns. Comparison to rent.01. Rent.01 is a member of VN class get-13.5-1. Framed by Katie (from rental.01-n)

example.name: some args
example.text: John rents a room from Mary for a buck a week.

example.name: with term
example.text: John rented a room from Mary for a year, then moved out.

example.name: nominal rel: renting
example.text: Gastrell is somewhat of a mystery to the club members in spite of his renting a house from one of them.

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: Jayark , New York , distributes and rents audio-visual equipment and prints promotional ads for retailers .

example.name: a bunch of args
example.text: Mary rented a room to John for a buck an hour.

example.name: with term
example.text: Mary rented a room to John for a week, then evicted him.

example.name: from the loaner's perspective - Note that "nets an extra..." is not the rent paid and is in a VP node, so should be marked as PRD!
example.text: My rental of the apartment nets an extra $500 a month

example.name: landlord
example.text: As cable stations started up, the main thurst of KPS's business gradually turned from program production to * renting out its studios.
